TopicTitle: Kerbals in IVA not responding to input. Cause, Fly by wire addon.

Articles.Content:
Firstly I have looked at this thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75586-Master-Thread-Unresponsive-Kerbals-in-EVA and tried all fixes.

Also my bug is sort of different. Firstly I can climb ladders, but one thing wierd is that the legs/animations of the kerbals are not moving when climbing ladders.

Secondly I can activate reports etc, the problem is that I can't move my kerbal at all! Pressing WASD dosen't move the kerbal, its like its dead.

edit: oh just realised I might not have unlocked the ksp eva thing.

Edited January 11, 2015 by tempsgk
Ok just tested it after buying the eva thing. Still kerbals not responding to input 0_0
Not heard of this one yet, unless it's the alternative walk mode, try pressing alt.

Does it do this with all Kerbals? What about in another save?

There may be clues in your log, see the stickies on where to find these.

What addons are you using? One may be causing this.

Yeah with all kerbals, no matter the save.

My log at the moment: https://www.dropbox.com/s/3oxgpma5w9n9n7o/KSP.log?dl=0

Installed addons:

Improved chase camera

CollisonFX

RKE joystick

Advanced fly by wire

Navhud

SwitchVessel

BetterBuoyancy

Toolbar

AutoAsparagus

Editor Extensions

ModuleRCSFX

RCSbuildaid

landingheight

Chopit

KerbalEngineerRedux

FAR

EnhancedNavBall

Pilot assistance

inflight waypoints

precise node

RCSland aid

Trajectories

mechjeb

Dark Multi player

Part Wizard

DOcking part alignment

Strip Symmetry

Texture replacer

TimeControl

WiderContracts App

Edited January 11, 2015 by tempsgk
edit: found the problem, caused by the advance fly by wire mod.

Thanks for finding the cause, I don't use addons to the same degree as yourself and had no idea, but your finding can help others who run into the same thing.

Can you drop a post in the fly by wire addon thread letting them know of this issue please.
